hero_sub: We believe everyone deserves to sound like themselves in any language. We're building a generation that's confident, articulate, and globally competitive — one real conversation at a time.
vision_text: To transform how people speak to the world — building a generation that's confident, articulate, and globally competitive, one real conversation at a time.
history_p1: We started Speexify because we lived the problem. We knew people who studied English for years but still froze in interviews. Who understood everything but couldn't express themselves. Who had the skills for their dream job — except the language.
history_p2: So we built something different. Not another course. Not another app. A place where real human coaches meet you where you are and push you toward where you want to be. Live. Adaptive. Relentless about your progress.
values_subtitle: The principles that make us different
value1_desc: We don't sell lessons. We help you achieve outcomes — landing jobs, leading meetings, traveling confidently, becoming the person you've always wanted to be.
value2_desc: Fluency doesn't come from textbooks. It comes from messy, adaptive, real human practice. That's what we deliver — every session.
value3_desc: We understand where you're coming from. The hesitation. The patterns. The barriers. And we meet you there — with world-class coaching that takes you further.
value4_desc: No vague promises. Every session moves you forward. You'll feel the difference in weeks — in your confidence, your clarity, and your voice.
life_p1: We're a remote team spread across time zones, united by one mission: breaking down language barriers for people who refuse to let words hold them back.
life_p2: Every coach, every team member — we've seen what happens when someone finally speaks like themselves. That moment is why we do this.
timeline1_text: Speexify begins as a small coaching collective focused on real-world English.
timeline2_text: Launched 24/7 scheduling and built a global network of expert coaches.
timeline3_text: Expanded to serve learners across multiple countries with personalized paths.
timeline4_text: Introduced AI-assisted practice to make every session even more powerful.
leaders_subtitle: We've lived this journey — now we're here to guide yours
testimonials_subtitle: Hear from people who took the leap
testi1_quote: I went from avoiding calls to leading client meetings. Speexify didn't just teach me English — it gave me my voice.
testi2_quote: Two months of coaching did what years of classes couldn't. I finally speak like myself.
testi3_quote: The interview coaching landed me my dream job. Worth every session.
testi4_quote: I travel solo now without fear. I can actually connect with people anywhere.
cta_text: Join thousands of learners who stopped waiting and started speaking. Your transformation begins today.
offer_subtitle: Built for real people with real goals
offer_card1_text: Nail the interview. Lead the meeting. Get the promotion you've been working toward.
offer_card2_text: Finally speak like you think. Natural, clear, and without hesitation.
offer_card3_text: Connect with people anywhere. Travel solo. Live without language holding you back.
offer_card4_text: Crush IELTS, TOEFL, or university speaking tasks with targeted practice.
digital_only_note: All Speexify services are delivered online. Coaching and platform access — no physical goods shipped.
